article: the united states postal service -lrb- usps -rrb- has agreed to stop referring to taiwan as a `` province of china '' on its web site in response to a complaint lodged by the formosan association for public affairs -lrb- unk -rrb- , officials at the u.s.-based pro-taiwan independence group said monday .
abstract: us postal service agrees to drop province of china reference
